text_logic_form: A line is tangent to a circle.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The line $ST$ is tangent to the circle with center $S$.
There is a circle with center $S$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $ST$ is $20$ units.
The length of the line $TC$ is $12$ units.
The length of the line $RC$ is $x$ units.
Point $S$ lies on the circle with center $R$ and radius $3.0$.
Point $C$ also lies on this circle.
circle_instances: There is a circle with center $R$.
